ID: C1NEO90_00
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Savio Salvador D'costa <Savio.Dcosta@nascodubai.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-03-05 12:07
Subject: KYC - Chalhoub
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Savio,

Hope all is well.

The KYC details I have in hand can be viewed in the below link.

KYC - chalhoub 1.zip <https://mctfze-my.sharepoint.com/:u:/g/personal/hagop_ghazarian_chalhoub_com/EVkz8mQ_dMpDsXJTqm6nd0oB2zRlP-7Y-rA1qOvXSjScpw> 

For the CGL, you can issue one policy covering all UAE entities under Allied Enterprises LLC.

The below entities you can insure together with Allied Enterprises LLC under a single policy for the PAR and Marine.

*	
	Real FZE
*	
	Fitra International FZE
*	
	MCT FZE
*	
	Chalhoub Inc. FZE
*	
	Traveller Limited
*	
	CGR FZE
*	
	Sogedimo Trading Company Limited
*	
	Ghawali FZE
*	
	Modern Media Studios FZ-LLC

The following entities need be insured and billed separately for the PAR and Marine, as applicable:

Mainland:

*	
	Chalmax
*	
	L'Occitane
*	
	Clad Trading

Freezone:

*	
	Ella Afrique FZCO
*	
	Elizabeth Arden FZCO

Combination Mainland/Freezone:

*	
	PUIG Emirates / Puig Middle East FZCO

As per the attached correspondence, the amended terms agreed should be included in the revised policy for Allied.

Also, the below banks should be mentioned as loss payee and specific for the mentioned entities:

As per the attached correspondence, the amended terms agreed should be included in the revised policy for Allied.

Also, the below banks should be mentioned as loss payee and specific for the mentioned entities:

ALLIED
BNP/ADCB/HSBC
FITRA
ADCB
REAL FZE
HSBC
SOGEDIMO
BNP

Finally, please advise if you need anything in terms of KYC for H&C.

Let us please have a call today at around 4pm if possible to align.

Best Regards,
Hagop
HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑
